name: SQL Server Example
description: This is a sample SQL Server Example that looks up a custom hostname

options.name: Database Host
options.description: The hostname of the server hosting your SQL Server instance

options.name: Database Port
options.description: The port your database instance is listening on

options.name: Database Name
options.description: The name of the database you are connecting to

options.name: Windows Username
options.description: The windows username that you are authenticating as

options.name: Users Password
options.description: The password of the user you are authenticating as

options.name: Windows Domain
options.description: The domain the database is running under (e.g., WORKGROUP)

options.name: Query
options.description: The query you want to execute and return data for.  Replace the entity with "@entity".  (e.g., SELECT * FROM data WHERE ip = @entity).
